org.hps.monitoring.ecal.eventdisplay.io

Class LCIOManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hps.monitoring.ecal.eventdisplay.io.LCIOManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventManager

    public class LCIOManager
extends Object
implements EventManager
    Class LCIOManager is an implementation of EventManager for (S)LCIO files.

    Warning: This class is under construction and should not be used at this time!

        public void close()

        Specified by:

        Throws:
